1225910.name: Desert of Doitjma
1225910.description:
Desert of Doitjam is an adventure platformer about a young person, Murphy, that is sent by Doitjma to an alternate reality for a series of survival games. At the end, Murphy might face Doitjma itself and fight for his freedom. Well, but only if he can survive long enough.


/features and content/
Desert of Doitjma is a adventure platform game.
> Mystery and adventure feel;
> Alternate reality survival game;
> Progressively harder enemies and levels;
> Character-driven story.

Desert of Doitjma is a Spaceman's series spin-off.
1225910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
